Posts.Content: My birthday is coming up really fast, wow. I cannot believe I will be 43 on my next birthday especially dealing with breast cancer. This is the cards that I am currently dealt and trying to play the hand to the best of ability. I am going to plan something special for my day, not sure what. Just saying another year is truely a blessing for me. Sharice
